unnormalised: Last year, our family trip to Kerala cost us around ₹50,000. The flight tickets alone were almost Rs 15000 per person round trip! And then there's the hotel, we booked a nice place near Munnar for 5 nights, which was approximately ₹10,000. Food expenses averaged about Rs. 1500 per day. Auto rides added up to another Rs 2000. Shopping for spices and souvenirs came to Rs 5000. Overall, it was a wonderful experience, totally worth the ₹50K.
normalised: Last year, our family trip to Kerala cost us around rupee fifty thousand. The flight tickets alone were almost rupee fifteen thousand per person round trip! And then there's the hotel, we booked a nice place near Munnar for five nights, which was approximately rupee ten thousand. Food expenses averaged about rupee one thousand five hundred per day. Auto rides added up to another rupee two thousand. Shopping for spices and souvenirs came to rupee five thousand. Overall, it was a wonderful experience, totally worth the rupee fifty thousand.
